title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. When searching for declarations, this fully qualified name is not found.
EB: The Search dialog should first try to get the Java element based on the fully qualified name. If that fails, it should display the element name without the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click and choose 'Search' from the context menu.
4. Observe the search results.
5. Close the Search dialog.
6. Select the same package again.
7. Click on the 'Search' button in the toolbar.
8. Observe that no results are displayed.

Note: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name, which should be handled correctly when searching for declarations.
